description: The interplay between immune cells and microRNAs in the tumor microenvironment (TME). MRX34 and MRG‐106 (cobomarsen) are miRNA therapeutic agents. Adapted from figure 1 in [Cortez et al](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/30578699).
title: Interactions between immune cells and microRNAs in tumor microenvironment
